tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Two of my front teeth got broken by an accident and I visited Dr Rohini Gupta for a reconstruction. She heard my problem patiently, checked my teeth and discssued the pros n cons of the treatment. Also, she gave me an estimate of the cost and the time required for the treatment beforehand. When I agreed to go ahead with the treatment, she gave me an appointment considering both of our convenience. I found the Dr. very cooperative and friendly. During the treatment, utmost care was taken for covid. She was very patient and meticulous throughout the process. At each step she made sure if I am comfortable. It took almost 1.30-2 hrs for teeth reconstruction with scaling and polishing. She didn't hurry at all. The finishing was so good that its impossible to differentiate between the artificial and the real part. She asked me if any modifications needed, and when I requested minor changes she did it promptly. Overall I am highly impressed by the quality of treatment and more importantly by the hassle free feel good process. You can trust Dr Gupta blindly for any dental issues. Highly recommended.
reply_text: Thank you so much Anindita for your kind words ..best wishes ðŸ˜Š

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been to a lot of dentists for my teeth but I had not meet such a sincere professional like Dr Rohini! She explained the process to me patiently and ensured I understood the treatment. She is one of the very few perfectionists who doesn't give false ideas only to get the patient start on the treatment. She improvised till the final sitting and ensured I was fully satisfied. The staff at the clinic are very polite and efficient. I would ðŸ’¯ recommend her to anyone who has any dental issue!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr Rohini Gupta on recommendation of my colleagues and it is one of the best decision..as I am extremely happy with the treatment done by the doctor.  She is very friendly and caring and helped me understand the cause of my dental pain and cavities.  Very patient and extremely committed to her work. She has done 6 tooth coloured fillings for my teeth which has completely changed my smile. The teeth were broken due to a previous accident and I was not happy with the smile. But she has done a fantastic job and i am very satisfied. 
She is a wonderful dentist and I would recommend her to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I was looking for a good Endodontist in and around my locality for RCT treatment for myself & my wife. Then after google searching I have found Dr Rohini Gupta's name and good review in practo site.  Dr Rohini Gupta's academic profile in practo speaks her competency. But it is really tested & experienced while I have done my RCT in her Saltlake chamber. Cool chamber, very clean. Total three seatings for RCT , excellent knowledge about the subject, very professional approach, explained the query from the patient, impacable maintaing of time management. Almost painfree RCT. Her team consisting of another two persons, they are Moumita & Sandeep , they are so co-operative & always having smiling on their face. Overall our experience at Teeth & Gum clinic is fabulous and we are looking for further ensuing dental treatment at her clinic.I shall take this opportunity to thank Dr Rohini Gupta & her team for all the treatment & help , they rendered to us.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the detailed feedback Mr Dutta..it was a lovely experience for me as well.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wife was suffering from periodontitis. Following an online consultation with Dr.Rohini (where she quickly diagnosed the problem), we visited Teeth & Gums clinic, where Dr.Anuj conducted tooth scaling procedure. We found both the doctors knowledgeable and professional. I commend the services offered by Teeth & Gums clinic. We plan to revisit the clinic to get dental braces for my wife...
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had been suffering  from severe pain  and sleepless nights for the past few days. As suggested  by Dr gupta, I underwent root canal treatment.  Entire treatment  was absolutely  painless including the injection , in fact I dozed off during  the session. The clinic  is very neat and clean, and staffs are very supportive.  I will be visiting  for crown on my next appointment.  I would definitely recommend  Dr gupta to anyone looking for painless root canal treatment .
She is very sweet and friendly . She explained me what is the issue in my tooth and what is required . Also the charges are reasonable . Looking forward to take treatment from her .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was very satisfactory and had a good time treating. 
My doctor was very friendly and  handled with care and concern.  I would readily recommend her to my friends and family  . Thank you for your service  .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got my tooth cavity filled up some years back  but in less than 6 months it started withering *** *** ** ** ** *** **** ********* ** ** *** ****** ********** It costs me around 5000 .. The clinic was previously located in the kawlity market.
reply_text:
We do not charge 5000 for a filling..it was a Root Canal treatment which is always advised by every dentist to be followed by a crown..
As you have mentioned, the tooth was treated years back and not being covered by a crown, there are high chances of breakage or material loss. No follow up from the patient further worsens the situation. We would still request you to visit the clinic to see if the tooth can still be saved.
Regards
Dr Rohini Gupta
